entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , St. Catharines
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:06 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 1.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. Catharines / Niagara District Airport 11:00 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 1.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa rising
Visibility: 19.3 km
Humidity: 83 %
Dewpoint: -1.0°C
Wind: E 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Friday: Rain mixed with snow. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Rain mixed with snow at times heavy beginning late this afternoon. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 5. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy or rain. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Rain mixed with snow at times heavy changing to snow at times heavy and blowing snow this evening. Snowfall amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Snow ending late in the morning then clearing. Wind east 30 km/h becoming light in the morning. High plus 5. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023
